online_education.full_paragraph: Online education provides significant flexibility. This is because students can learn at their own pace rather than following a fixed classroom schedule. For instance, they can pause videos, rewatch difficult concepts, and study when they are most alert. In other words, learning becomes truly personalized to each student's needs. Consequently, this leads to better understanding and higher retention of information.
